channel.title: Vs2010 on Tim Van Wassenhove
channel.description: Recent content in Vs2010 on Tim Van Wassenhove

item.title: Deploying a Database Project does not create artefacts for custom schemas
item.description: Last week we noticed that the artefacts for a custom schema in our Database Project were not created (or updated). It took us a while to figure out what was wrong. When you add a script via the ‘Add Existing item’ menu in VS2010 the file’s Build Action is set to Not in Build for some unknown reason. As soon as we changed the value to Build and Deployed again our artefacts were created.
